overview: Enjoy Sophia Santi and Jana Cova in this wonderful and sexy horror spoof. Set in another era, 6 erotic stories unfold in an eerie mansion. It's delightfully wicked and sensationally horny with an A-list cast, lots of plastic wrap and ball gags. Director Celeste weaves a tale of seduction and lust with an all girl orgy, boy / girl, two on one and even some cock throbbing anal action. When you are fully satiated and lured by the real time audio soundtrack, return for the special features including a fantastic behind-the-scenes glimpse of the Digital Playground cast and crew in playful action!
title: Sophia Santi: Scream
